metadata.title: CVE-2022-25327 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The PAM module for fscrypt doesn't adequately validate fscrypt metadatafiles, allowing users to create malicious metadata files that prevent otherusers from logging in. A local user can cause a denial of service bycreating a fscrypt metadata file that prevents other users from logginginto the system. We recommend upgrading to version 0.3.3 or above

criterions.comment: fscrypt package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
